text: Raymond Aumae[https://theislandsun.com.sb/church-reconciliation-in- buma/retired-bishop-raymond-aumae-back-buma-parish-priest-fr-willie-mae-left- join-with-the-leader-representatives-of-the-tribes-in-the-reconciliation- ceremony-at-buma-community-in-west-kwara/ The Island Sun] was the third Bishop of Malaita, one of the nine dioceses that make up the Anglican Church of Melanesia:ACOM he served from 1990 to 1994.List of small publications in the Archives of the Anglican Church of Melanesia (in the National Archives of Solomon Islands) p. 16. (Accessed 13 February 2020) ==References== Category:Bishops of Malaita Category:21st-century Anglican bishops
title: Raymond Aumae
